TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManipulationStartingEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ManipulationStartingEventArgs Inherits InputEventArgs
public ref class ManipulationStartingEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::Input::InputEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使您能够指定操作的行为。The enable you to specify the behavior of a manipulation. 使用执行以下操作:Use the to do the following: - 通过设置属性, 指定位置应相对于元素。Specify that the position should be relative to an element by setting the property. - 通过设置属性来指定是否启用单指操作。Specify whether single-finger manipulation are enabled by setting the property. - 通过将属性设置为枚举来指定要启用的操作类型。Specify which types of manipulation are enabled by setting the property to a enumeration. - 通过设置属性来指定单指旋转的中心。Specify the center of a single-finger rotation by setting the property. - 通过将属性设置为来`true`取消操作。Cancel the manipulation by setting the property to `true`. 有关操作的详细信息, 请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 有关响应操作的应用程序的示例, 请参阅[演练:正在创建您的第](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)一个 Touch 应用程序。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Cancel() cil managed

summary.span: 取消操作并将触摸提升为鼠标事件。

span.span: Cancels the manipulation and promotes touch to mouse events.

returns.span: 如果触摸成功提升为鼠标事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if touch was successfully promoted to mouse events, otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该方法成功, 则默认情况下, 将上一次触摸事件发送到鼠标按下事件, 以后操作事件不会发生。If the method succeeds, the default sends previous touch down events as mouse down events and future manipulation events do not occur.

summary.span: 获取或设置所有操作事件和计算都与之相关的容器。

span.span: Gets or sets the container that all manipulation events and calculations are relative to.

value.span: 所有操作事件和计算都与之相关的容器。

span.span: The container that all manipulation events and calculations are relative to.

value.span: 默认值为发生事件的元素。

span.span: The default is the element on which the event occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过设置属性来指定该位置应与另一个元素相关。You can specify that the position should be relative to another element by setting the property. 例如, 你可以使操作位置相对于接收操作事件的元素的父级。For example, you can make the manipulation positions relative to the parent of the element that receives the manipulation events. 只能在事件处理程序中设置。The event handler is the only place in which you can set the . 有关操作的详细信息, 请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 有关响应操作的应用程序的示例, 请参阅[演练:正在创建您的第](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)一个 Touch 应用程序。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个描述单点操作的轴的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that describes the pivot for a single-point manipulation.

value.span: 一个描述单点操作的轴的对象。

span.span: An object that describes the pivot for a single-point manipulation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性时, 当用户在操作过程中使用一根手指时, 操作将包含旋转数据。When you set the property, the manipulation will contain rotation data when the user uses one finger during a manipulation. 这是为了模拟真实世界的情况, 在这种情况下, 可以使用一根手指来旋转对象, 例如表中的一张纸。This is to simulate real-world situations where you can use one finger to rotate an object, such as a piece of paper on a table. 如果为`null`, 则用户必须使用两根手指来产生旋转。If the is `null`, the user must use two fingers to cause rotation. 有关操作的详细信息, 请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 有关响应操作的应用程序的示例, 请参阅[演练:正在创建您的第](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)一个 Touch 应用程序。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序并设置属性。The following example shows an event handler for the event and sets the property. 若要测试此示例, 请按照[演练:创建第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)程序, 并将步骤4中的代码替换为此代码。To test this example, follow the steps in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md) and replace the code in step 4 with this code. [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationPivot](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.cs#manipulationpivot)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationPivot](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/reportboundaryfeedbackexample.xaml.vb#manipulationpivot)]

summary.span: 将参数添加到指定元素的当前操作中。

span.span: Adds parameters to the current manipulation of the specified element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不需要调用此方法。You typically do not need to call this method. 改为使用上的属性。Use the properties on the instead.
